newsitem.title: USA: Fred Meyer to file for 4 mln shr offering.
newsitem.headline: Fred Meyer to file for 4 mln shr offering.

text.p: Fred Meyer Inc said on Wednesday it planned to file with the Securities and Exchange Commission for a public offering of four million shares.
The offering, which will be made only by means of a prospectus, will consist of
The four million shares include a 400,000-share over-allotment option.
The stock will be sold by FMI Associates, an affiliate of Kohlberg Kravis Roberts & Co L.P.. Fred Meyer will not sell any shares.

Concurrent with the consummation of the offering, Fred Meyer plans to repurchase about $70 million of its common stock from FMI at a price equal to the public offering price, less the underwriting discount.
Fred Meyer plans to finance the share repurchase with borrowings through its existing credit facilities.
Before the offering and share repurchase, FMI beneficially owned 10.7 million Fred Meyer shares. Fred Meyer has about 26.7 million shares outstanding.
Fred Meyer also said it would close a sale/leaseback deal for 10 of its stores on Thursday. The deal will generate about $108 million in net proceeds that will be used to pay down credit lines.
